pages.text: $(li)The Snowy Mountains are a variant of the Mountain biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This biome is composed of mostly by Stone, Dirt and, Snow layers, convering the whole area.
$(li)You can find some vegetation here like Spruce and Oak trees here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Snowy Mountains$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
